name: Botanical Breakout (Superbannana_64)
description: Botanical Breakout is a top down, time based arcade game where the player must eat as many people as possible before the burning building around them collapses. Using a flight joystick, you control the position and movement of a carnivorous piranha plant, and must consume everything in your path before the fires consume you. Players can only move when consuming people, dragging their pot to the person's location.
